did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Laboratory for Elementary Particle Physics photographs, 1950-2005.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University.Laboratory for Elementary Particle Physics (LEPP).

physdesc.label: Quantity:
physdesc.extent: 7.6 cubic ft; 12 drawers of negatives;125 volumes of photographs with index.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes material documenting events, the Wilson Synchrotron Laboratory and work done at the lab.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes photographs, slides, negatives and scrapbooks taken/collected by Donald Miller, a graphics designer, documenting events, the Wilson Synchrotron Laboratory and work done at the lab.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Laboratory for Elementary Particle Physics photographs, #14-22-3483. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: A list of these photos with their media type and size is available upon request.

scopecontent.p:
Includes summary pages listing File Number, Cross Reference, N P S T where N-Negative, P-Print, S-Slide, T-Transparency, PS PhotoServices, VS Visual Services, HS Hadley Smith and the following larger sections:
1 Newman Laboratory: The Beginning
10 300-MeV
20 1.4-GeV
30 2.2-GeV
40 C-Bug (Cosmic Ray, Balloon, E170)
50 10-GeV (Building Construction)
51 10-GeV (Tunnel Construction)
52 10-GeV (Linac)
53 10-GeV (Magnets)
54 10-GeV (Electronics)
55 10-GeV (Experiments)
56 10-GeV (Miscellaneous)
57 10-GeV (RF)
60 CESR (Building Construction)
61 CESR (Assembly)
62 CESR (Magnets)
63 CESR (Injection)
64 CESR (Vacuum)
65 CESR (RF)
66 CESR (Superconducting RF)
67 CESR (Miscellaneous)
70 CLEO I (Mechanical)
71 CLEO I (Electronics)
80 CLEO II (Mechanical)
81 CLEO II (Electronics)
82 CLEO III (Mechanical)
83 CLEO III (Electronics)
90 Mini-Beta
100 Micro-Beta
110 CHESS
120 CUSB
130 Achievements
131 Symposiums, Conferences, Meeting, etc.
132 Education / Outreach
140 Personnel
150 Social Functions
160 Miscellaneous / General
161 General Physics
162 Public Relations
170 B-Factory
